title: The Pain Antidote: The Proven Program to Help You Stop Suffering
description:
Mel Pohl and Katherine Ketcham, "The Pain Antidote: The Proven Program to Help You Stop Suffering from Chronic Pain, Avoid Addiction to Painkillers--and Reclaim Your Life"

ISBN: 0738218030 | 2015 | EPUB | 320 pages | 14 MB

Chronic pain is not a life sentence

If you are one of the 100 million people who suffer from chronic pain, you may be feeling hopeless and helpless, relying on endless medications that don't work, feeling worse and worse. But there is hopeÃ¢â‚¬â€and help. The innovative program at the acclaimed Las Vegas Recovery Center, at which Dr. Mel Pohl is Medical Director, has helped thousands of sufferers to reduce chronic pain without the use of painkillers
